sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnwikmnthngreprt ( REPRT_ID , reprt_se , reprt_sj , report_de , wrter_id , reportr_id , report_bgnde , report_endde , thswik_report_cn , nextwik_report_cn , partclr_matter , atch_file_id , confm_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm ) VALUES ( #reprtId# , #reprtSe# , #reprtSj# , #reportDe# , #wrterId# , #reportrId# , #reportBgnde# , #reportEndde# , #thswikReportCn# , #nextwikReportCn# , #partclrMatter# , #atchFileId# , #confmDt# , #frstRegisterId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnwikmnthngreprt SET reprt_id = #reprtId# , reprt_se = #reprtSe# , reprt_sj = #reprtSj# , report_de = #reportDe# , wrter_id = #wrterId# , reportr_id = #reportrId# , report_bgnde = #reportBgnde# , report_endde = #reportEndde# , thswik_report_cn = #thswikReportCn# , nextwik_report_cn = #nextwikReportCn# , partclr_matter = #partclrMatter# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , confm_dt = #confmDt# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# WHERE reprt_id = #reprtId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT reprt_id , reprt_se , reprt_sj , report_de , wrter_id , reportr_id , report_bgnde , report_endde , thswik_report_cn , nextwik_report_cn , partclr_matter , atch_file_id , confm_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnwikmnthngreprt WHERE reprt_id = #reprtId#

SELECT reprt_id , reprt_se , reprt_sj , report_de , wrter_id , reportr_id , report_bgnde , report_endde , thswik_report_cn , nextwik_report_cn , partclr_matter , atch_file_id , confm_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnwikmnthngreprt WHERE 1=1
reprt_id = #searchKeyword#
reprt_se LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY reprt_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnwikmnthngreprt WHERE 1=1
reprt_id = #searchKeyword#
reprt_se LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
